title: Seared feather blade of Wagyu beef with shallot rings, beetroot purée, curly kale, sautéed potatoes, beef jus
description: Wagyu beef is the last word in luxury cuts of meat, balanced here with the earthy flavours of beetroot and kale.
ingredients: 1 banana shallot, peeled, sliced into ½cm/¼in rings
1 sprig fresh mint, 2 sprigs fresh mint, leaves finely chopped
4 x 150g/5½oz 1cm/½in thick steaks from the Wagyu feather blade
150ml/5½fl oz beef jus, or reduced beef stock
